backup_history_days.description: BackupHistoryDays controls how many days of backup history are retrieved.
backup_history_days.title: Backup History Days

collect_bufferpool_metrics.description: CollectBufferpoolMetrics toggles buffer pool efficiency metrics.
collect_bufferpool_metrics.title: Collect Bufferpool Metrics

collect_bufferpools_matching.description: CollectBufferpoolsMatching filters buffer pools by name using glob patterns.
collect_bufferpools_matching.title: Collect Bufferpools Matching

collect_connections_matching.description: CollectConnectionsMatching filters monitored connections by application ID.
collect_connections_matching.title: Collect Connections Matching

collect_database_metrics.description: CollectDatabaseMetrics toggles high-level database status metrics.
collect_database_metrics.title: Collect Database Metrics

collect_databases_matching.description: CollectDatabasesMatching filters databases by name using glob patterns.
collect_databases_matching.title: Collect Databases Matching

collect_table_io_metrics.description: CollectTableIOMetrics enables table I/O statistics when available.
collect_table_io_metrics.title: Collect Table Io Metrics

collect_table_metrics.description: CollectTableMetrics toggles table-level size and row metrics.
collect_table_metrics.title: Collect Table Metrics

collect_tablespaces_matching.description: CollectTablespacesMatching filters tablespaces by name using glob patterns.
collect_tablespaces_matching.title: Collect Tablespaces Matching

collect_wait_metrics.title: Collect Wait Metrics

dsn.description: DSN provides a full DB2 connection string when manual control is required.
dsn.title: DSN

max_bufferpools.description: MaxBufferpools caps the number of buffer pools charted.
max_bufferpools.title: Max Bufferpools

max_connections.description: MaxConnections caps the number of connection instances charted.
max_connections.title: Max Connections

max_databases.description: MaxDatabases caps the number of databases charted.
max_databases.title: Max Databases

max_db_conns.description: MaxDbConns limits the connection pool size.
max_db_conns.title: Max Db Conns

max_db_life_time.description: MaxDbLifeTime forces pooled connections to be recycled after the specified duration.
max_db_life_time.title: Max Db Life Time

max_indexes.description: MaxIndexes caps the number of indexes charted.
max_indexes.title: Max Indexes

max_tables.description: MaxTables caps the number of tables charted.
max_tables.title: Max Tables

max_tablespaces.description: MaxTablespaces caps the number of tablespaces charted.
max_tablespaces.title: Max Tablespaces
